and find hidden secrets within their physique."

"Mission, goal, any last straw in finding meaning in this
rotten existence... Isch all figure of speech..."
"My methodss... They seem cruel and hideous, yesch..."

Map003.Event[178].Page[1].list.message[1: "Please leave me. I'm not here to make acquaintances and
I fail to see what worth chatting with you would bring..."
Map003.Event[178].Page[1].list.message[4: The dark priest seems clearly frustrated by you.
Map003.Event[178].Page[1].list.message[5: "My name is Enki. A priest of destruction."
Map003.Event[178].Page[1].list.message[7: "What does it look like? I can see how a brute like
yourself wouldn't understand the meaning of libraries..."
Map003.Event[178].Page[2].list.message[0: "Listen I am through with this conversation. It brings no
Map003.Event[178].Page[2].list.message[2: The dark priest doesn't seem to want your company at
moment. It might not be a good idea to bother him.
Map003.Event[178].Page[3].list.message[1: "You just keep on talking to me in hopes of gaining even
a smallest advantage in this darkness, do you?"
Map003.Event[178].Page[3].list.message[2: "Dark priests are generally frowned upon in the supressed
modern societies, but then we suddenly become a valuable
asset when you're facing eternal darkness."
Map003.Event[178].Page[3].list.message[3: "Well your survival is none of my concern."
Map003.Event[178].Page[3].list.message[4: "In fact, you would most likely be more valuable to me, after
the horrors of these dungeons have had their way with you."
